author: seba.wagner
msg: Completed rework of Audio and Video:
- No More *Buffer-Full/Buffer-Empty* Events after resyncing the Stream
- Bigger picture of the Video in Event Modus (needs to change the default Values in the Installation for the Video-Pod-Size and Whiteboard-X Position)

Mute-Button and Activity-Meter not included yet, but Streaming, Re-Sync, Recording Should work. The Settings for the Audio-Video Streaming are different now. I should add a Wiki Page concerning the new values.
